definition: echo/sound/noise/to make a sound/to sound/to ring/loud/classifier for noises

sentences.english: They also heard about the quiet ways he took care of people.
sentences.chinese: 他们还听人讲到他如何不声不响地关注他人。

sentences.english: Like the corner of the street, make no reply love who?
sentences.chinese: 像拐角的路灯，不声不响的爱着谁？

sentences.english: He sat there silently for the whole afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 整个下午他坐在那里不声不响。

sentences.english: An official revision of history was quietly taking place.
sentences.chinese: 官方历史就这样不声不响地改头换面了。

sentences.english: I felt that it would rain forever, noiselessly.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得老天会不声不响地永远下着雨。

sentences.english: She left the room as inconspicuously as possible.
sentences.chinese: 她尽可能做到不声不响地离开房间。

sentences.english: Aladdin was overjoyed, but, saying little, retired to his chamber.
sentences.chinese: 阿拉丁大喜过望，但不声不响地回到自己房间中。

definition: lit. to not show the mountain and to not reveal the water (idiom); fig. to hide the key facts
pinyin: bu4 xian3 shan1 bu4 lu4 shui3
shen2 bu4 zhi1 gui3 bu4 jue2

definition: not a word or movement (idiom); remaining calm and collected/not batting an eyelid
as if nothing had happened (idiom); calmly/nonchalantly
not show one's feeling or intentions
complete change from the normal state (idiom); quite uncharacteristic/entirely outside the norm/out of character
calm and unhurried (idiom); composed/to take matters calmly
